title: An Introduction to scikit-learn: Machine Learning in Python
summary: This tutorial will offer an introduction to the scikit-learn package and to the central concepts of Machine Learning.  We will introduce the basic categories of learning problems, and explore practical examples based on real-world data, from handwriting analysis to facial recognition to automated classification of astronomical images.
